.NET Framework 3.5.name: SDK_SimController
.NET Framework 3.5.summary: The Sim Controller SDK script provides functions to help simulate VR controllers.

methods.name: GenerateControllerPointerOrigin(GameObject parent)
methods.summary: The GenerateControllerPointerOrigin method can create a custom pointer origin Transform to represent the pointer position and forward.
methods.returns: A generated Transform that contains the custom pointer origin.

params.value: The GameObject that the origin will become parent of. If it is a controller then it will also be used to determine the hand if required.

methods.name: GetActualController(ControllerHand hand)
methods.summary: finds the actual controller for the specified hand (identified by name) and returns it
methods.returns: the gameobject of the actual controller corresponding to the specified hand

params.value: the for which to find the respective controller gameobject

methods.name: GetAngularVelocity(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)
methods.summary: The GetAngularVelocity method is used to determine the current angular velocity of the tracked object on the given controller reference.
methods.returns: A Vector3 containing the current angular velocity of the tracked object.

params.value: The reference to the tracked object to check for.

methods.name: GetButtonAxis(ButtonTypes buttonType, VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)
methods.summary: The GetButtonAxis method retrieves the current X/Y axis values for the given button type on the given controller reference.
methods.returns: A Vector2 of the X/Y values of the button axis. If no axis values exist for the given button, then a Vector2.Zero is returned.

params.value: The type of button to check for the axis on.
The reference to the controller to check the button axis on.

methods.syntax: public Vector2 GetButtonAxis(ButtonTypes buttonType, VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)

methods.name: GetButtonHairlineDelta(ButtonTypes buttonType, VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)
methods.summary: The GetButtonHairlineDelta method is used to get the difference between the current button press and the previous frame button press.
methods.returns: The delta between the button presses.

params.value: The type of button to get the hairline delta for.
The reference to the controller to get the hairline delta for.

methods.syntax: public float GetButtonHairlineDelta(ButtonTypes buttonType, VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)

methods.name: GetControllerButtonState(uint index, string keyMapping, ButtonPressTypes pressType)
methods.summary: Gets the state of the given button key mapping for the press type on the controller index.
methods.returns: Returns true if the button state matches the given data.

params.value: The index of the controller.
The key mapping key to check.
The type of button press to check.

methods.syntax: protected virtual bool GetControllerButtonState(uint index, string keyMapping, ButtonPressTypes pressType)
methods.linkedSyntax: protected virtual bool GetControllerButtonState(uint index, string keyMapping, ButtonPressTypes pressType)

methods.name: GetControllerButtonState(ButtonTypes buttonType, ButtonPressTypes pressType, VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)
methods.summary: The GetControllerButtonState method is used to determine if the given controller button for the given press type on the given controller reference is currently taking place.
methods.returns: Returns true if the given button is in the state of the given press type on the given controller reference.

params.value: The type of button to check for the state of.
The button state to check for.
The reference to the controller to check the button state on.

methods.syntax: public bool GetControllerButtonState(ButtonTypes buttonType, ButtonPressTypes pressType, VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)
methods.linkedSyntax: public bool GetControllerButtonState(ButtonTypes buttonType, ButtonPressTypes pressType, [VRTK_ControllerReference](#/type/VRTK.VRTK_ControllerReference/index) controllerReference)

methods.name: GetControllerByIndex(uint index, bool actual)
methods.summary: The GetControllerByIndex method returns the GameObject of a controller with a specific index.
methods.returns: The GameObject of the controller

params.value: The index of the controller to find.
If true it will return the actual controller, if false it will return the script alias controller GameObject.

methods.syntax: public GameObject GetControllerByIndex(uint index, bool actual)
methods.linkedSyntax: public GameObject GetControllerByIndex(uint index, bool actual)

methods.name: GetControllerDefaultColliderPath(ControllerHand hand)
methods.summary: The GetControllerDefaultColliderPath returns the path to the prefab that contains the collider objects for the default controller of this SDK.
methods.returns: A path to the resource that contains the collider GameObject.

params.value: The controller hand to check for

methods.name: GetControllerElementPath(ControllerElements element, ControllerHand hand, bool fullPath)
methods.summary: The GetControllerElementPath returns the path to the game object that the given controller element for the given hand resides in.
methods.returns: A string containing the path to the game object that the controller element resides in.

params.value: The controller element to look up.
The controller hand to look up.
Whether to get the initial path or the full path to the element.

methods.syntax: public string GetControllerElementPath(ControllerElements element, ControllerHand hand, bool fullPath)
methods.linkedSyntax: public string GetControllerElementPath(ControllerElements element, ControllerHand hand, bool fullPath)

methods.name: GetControllerIndex(GameObject controller)
methods.summary: The GetControllerIndex method returns the index of the given controller.
methods.returns: The index of the given controller.

params.value: The GameObject containing the controller.

methods.name: GetControllerLeftHand(bool actual)
methods.summary: The GetControllerLeftHand method returns the GameObject containing the representation of the left hand controller.
methods.returns: The GameObject containing the left hand controller.

params.value: If true it will return the actual controller, if false it will return the script alias controller GameObject.

methods.name: GetControllerModel(GameObject controller)
methods.summary: The GetControllerModel method returns the model alias for the given GameObject.
methods.returns: The GameObject that has the model alias within it.

params.value: The GameObject to get the model alias for.

methods.name: GetControllerModel(ControllerHand hand)
methods.summary: The GetControllerModel method returns the model alias for the given controller hand.
methods.returns: The GameObject that has the model alias within it.

params.value: The hand enum of which controller model to retrieve.

methods.name: GetControllerOrigin(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)
methods.summary: The GetControllerOrigin method returns the origin of the given controller.
methods.returns: A Transform containing the origin of the controller.

params.value: The reference to the controller to retrieve the origin from.

methods.name: GetControllerRenderModel(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)
methods.summary: The GetControllerRenderModel method gets the game object that contains the given controller's render model.
methods.returns: A GameObject containing the object that has a render model for the controller.

params.value: The reference to the controller to check.

methods.name: GetControllerRightHand(bool actual)
methods.summary: The GetControllerRightHand method returns the GameObject containing the representation of the right hand controller.
methods.returns: The GameObject containing the right hand controller.

params.value: If true it will return the actual controller, if false it will return the script alias controller GameObject.

methods.name: GetCurrentControllerType()
methods.summary: The GetCurrentControllerType method returns the current used ControllerType based on the SDK and headset being used.
methods.returns: The ControllerType based on the SDK and headset being used.

methods.name: GetHapticModifiers()
methods.summary: The GetHapticModifiers method is used to return modifiers for the duration and interval if the SDK handles it slightly differently.
methods.returns: An SDK_ControllerHapticModifiers object with a given durationModifier and an intervalModifier.

methods.name: GetVelocity(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference)
methods.summary: The GetVelocity method is used to determine the current velocity of the tracked object on the given controller reference.
methods.returns: A Vector3 containing the current velocity of the tracked object.

params.value: The reference to the tracked object to check for.

methods.name: HapticPulse(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference, AudioClip clip)
methods.summary: The HapticPulse/2 method is used to initiate a haptic pulse based on an audio clip on the tracked object of the given controller reference.

params.value: The reference to the tracked object to initiate the haptic pulse on.
The audio clip to use for the haptic pattern.

methods.syntax: public bool HapticPulse(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference, AudioClip clip)

methods.name: HapticPulse(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference, float strength)
methods.summary: The HapticPulse/2 method is used to initiate a simple haptic pulse on the tracked object of the given controller reference.

params.value: The reference to the tracked object to initiate the haptic pulse on.
The intensity of the rumble of the controller motor. 0 to 1.

methods.syntax: public void HapticPulse(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference, float strength)

methods.name: IsButtonHairTouchIgnored()
methods.summary: whether or not a button press shall be ignored, e.g. because of the use of the touch or hair touch modifier
methods.returns: Returns true if the hair trigger touch should be ignored.

methods.name: IsButtonPressed(uint index, ButtonPressTypes type, KeyCode button)
methods.summary: checks if the given button (KeyCode) is currently in a specific pressed state (ButtonPressTypes) on the keyboard also asserts that button presses are only handled for the currently active controller by comparing the controller indices
methods.returns: Returns true if the button is being pressed.

params.value: unique index of the controller for which the button press is to be checked
the type of press (up, down, hold)
the button on the keyboard

methods.syntax: protected virtual bool IsButtonPressed(uint index, ButtonPressTypes type, KeyCode button)
methods.linkedSyntax: protected virtual bool IsButtonPressed(uint index, ButtonPressTypes type, KeyCode button)

methods.name: IsButtonPressIgnored()
methods.summary: whether or not a button press shall be ignored, e.g. because of the use of the touch or hair touch modifier
methods.returns: Returns true if the button press is ignored.

methods.name: IsControllerLeftHand(GameObject controller)
methods.summary: The IsControllerLeftHand/1 method is used to check if the given controller is the the left hand controller.
methods.returns: Returns true if the given controller is the left hand controller.

params.value: The GameObject to check.

methods.name: IsControllerLeftHand(GameObject controller, bool actual)
methods.summary: The IsControllerLeftHand/2 method is used to check if the given controller is the the left hand controller.
methods.returns: Returns true if the given controller is the left hand controller.

params.value: The GameObject to check.
If true it will check the actual controller, if false it will check the script alias controller.

methods.syntax: public bool IsControllerLeftHand(GameObject controller, bool actual)
methods.linkedSyntax: public bool IsControllerLeftHand(GameObject controller, bool actual)

methods.name: IsControllerRightHand(GameObject controller)
methods.summary: The IsControllerRightHand/1 method is used to check if the given controller is the the right hand controller.
methods.returns: Returns true if the given controller is the right hand controller.

params.value: The GameObject to check.

methods.name: IsControllerRightHand(GameObject controller, bool actual)
methods.summary: The IsControllerRightHand/2 method is used to check if the given controller is the the right hand controller.
methods.returns: Returns true if the given controller is the right hand controller.

params.value: The GameObject to check.
If true it will check the actual controller, if false it will check the script alias controller.

methods.syntax: public bool IsControllerRightHand(GameObject controller, bool actual)
methods.linkedSyntax: public bool IsControllerRightHand(GameObject controller, bool actual)

methods.name: IsHairTouchModifierPressed()
methods.summary: whether or not the hair touch modifier is currently pressed if so, pressing a key on the keyboard will only emit touch and hair touch events, but not a real press.
methods.returns: whether or not the HairTouchModifier is active

methods.name: IsTouchModifierPressed()
methods.summary: whether or not the touch modifier is currently pressed if so, pressing a key on the keyboard will only emit touch events, but not a real press (or hair touch events).
methods.returns: whether or not the TouchModifier is active

methods.name: IsTouchpadStatic(bool isTouched, Vector2 currentAxisValues, Vector2 previousAxisValues, int compareFidelity)
methods.summary: The IsTouchpadStatic method is used to determine if the touchpad is currently not being moved.
methods.returns: Returns true if the touchpad is not currently being touched or moved.
methods.syntax: public bool IsTouchpadStatic(bool isTouched, Vector2 currentAxisValues, Vector2 previousAxisValues, int compareFidelity)
methods.linkedSyntax: public bool IsTouchpadStatic(bool isTouched, Vector2 currentAxisValues, Vector2 previousAxisValues, int compareFidelity)

methods.name: ProcessFixedUpdate(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference, Dictionary<string, object> options)
methods.summary: The ProcessFixedUpdate method enables an SDK to run logic for every Unity FixedUpdate

params.value: The reference for the controller.
A dictionary of generic options that can be used to within the fixed update.

methods.syntax: public void ProcessFixedUpdate(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference, Dictionary<string, object> options)
methods.linkedSyntax: public void ProcessFixedUpdate([VRTK_ControllerReference](#/type/VRTK.VRTK_ControllerReference/index) controllerReference, Dictionary<string, object> options)

methods.name: ProcessUpdate(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference, Dictionary<string, object> options)
methods.summary: The ProcessUpdate method enables an SDK to run logic for every Unity Update

params.value: The reference for the controller.
A dictionary of generic options that can be used to within the update.

methods.syntax: public void ProcessUpdate(VRTK_ControllerReference controllerReference, Dictionary<string, object> options)
methods.linkedSyntax: public void ProcessUpdate([VRTK_ControllerReference](#/type/VRTK.VRTK_ControllerReference/index) controllerReference, Dictionary<string, object> options)

methods.name: SetControllerRenderModelWheel(GameObject renderModel, bool state)
methods.summary: The SetControllerRenderModelWheel method sets the state of the scroll wheel on the controller render model.

params.value: The GameObject containing the controller render model.
If true and the render model has a scroll wheen then it will be displayed, if false then the scroll wheel will be hidden.

methods.syntax: public void SetControllerRenderModelWheel(GameObject renderModel, bool state)
methods.linkedSyntax: public void SetControllerRenderModelWheel(GameObject renderModel, bool state)

methods.name: SetKeyMappings(Dictionary<string, KeyCode> givenKeyMappings)
methods.syntax: public virtual void SetKeyMappings(Dictionary<string, KeyCode> givenKeyMappings)
methods.linkedSyntax: public virtual void SetKeyMappings(Dictionary<string, KeyCode> givenKeyMappings)
